snippet: Speaking at the F.ounders conference on Friday, Arianna Huffington said that "selling to AOL was the best thing we ever did" -- because it allowed the online journalism juggernaut to grow much more quickly.
abstract: Speaking at the F.ounders conference on Friday, Arianna Huffington said that "selling to AOL was the best thing we ever did" -- because it allowed the online journalism juggernaut to grow much more quickly.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Huffington Says AOL Sale Was 'Best Thing We Ever Did'
